text: Buly Da Conceição Triste (born July 4, 1991) is a sprint canoeist from São Tomé and Príncipe. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's C-1 1000 metres event; his time of 4:46.396 in the semifinals did not qualify him for the finals. He was the flag bearer for São Tomé and Príncipe at the Parade of Nations. He won a gold, a silver and a bronze medal at the 2019 African Games. ==References== == External links == * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:São Tomé and Príncipe male canoeists Category:Olympic canoeists of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Canoeists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:African Games medalists in canoeing Category:African Games gold medalists for São Tomé and Príncipe Category:African Games silver medalists for São Tomé and Príncipe Category:African Games bronze medalists for São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:African Games competitors for São Tomé and Príncipe
title: Buly Da Conceição Triste
